verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> after שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> was returned שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> And it came to pass when Saul מֵאַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> from following פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <S%H5046><s%> that it was told לוֹ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> him saying הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> Behold David בְּמִדְבַּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> [is] in the wilderness עֵ֥ין גֶּֽדִי׃ <S%H5872><s%> of Engedi ס

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> Then Saul שְׁלֹ֧שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three אֲלָפִ֛ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men בָּח֖וּר <S%H970><s%> young מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> out of all Israel וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went לְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H376><s%> and his men עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> upon צוּרֵ֥י <S%H6697><s%> the rocks הַיְּעֵלִֽים׃ <S%H3277><s%> of the wild goats

וַ֠יָּבֹא <S%H935><s%> And he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גִּדְר֨וֹת <S%H1448><s%> wall הַצֹּ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> cattle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> by the way וְשָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> where מְעָרָ֔ה <S%H4631><s%> where [was] a cave וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> went in שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul לְהָסֵ֣ךְ <S%H5526><s%> to cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> his feet וְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> and David וַאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H376><s%> and his men בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֥י <S%H3411><s%> in the sides הַמְּעָרָ֖ה <S%H4631><s%> of the cave יֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <S%H3427><s%> remained

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> said אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> the men דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הַיּ֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto him Behold the day אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of which אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of which the LORD אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I נֹתֵ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> unto thee Behold I will deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [אֹיְבֵיךָ כ] (אֹֽיִבְךָ֙ <S%H341><s%> enemy ק) בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> into thine hand וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> that thou mayest do לּ֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> of which יִטַ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> to him as it shall seem good בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> unto thee וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> Then David וַיִּכְרֹ֛ת <S%H3772><s%> and cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּנַֽף־ <S%H3671><s%> the skirt הַמְּעִ֥יל <S%H4598><s%> robe אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of which לְשָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul's בַּלָּֽט׃ <S%H3909><s%> privily

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass afterward כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> after that וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> smote לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> that David's אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he כָּרַ֔ת <S%H3772><s%> him because he had cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּנָ֖ף <S%H3671><s%> skirt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> his לְשָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> Saul's ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לַאֲנָשָׁ֜יו <S%H582><s%> unto his men חָלִ֧ילָה <S%H2486><s%> forbid לִּ֣י מֵֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> should אֶעֱשֶׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> that I should do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֨ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> this לַֽאדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> unto my master לִמְשִׁ֣יחַ <S%H4899><s%> anointed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God לִשְׁלֹ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> to stretch forth יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand בּ֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> since מְשִׁ֥יחַ <S%H4899><s%> against him seeing he [is] the anointed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיְשַׁסַּ֨ע <S%H8156><s%> stayed דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> So David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲנָשָׁיו֙ <S%H376><s%> his men בַּדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> with these words וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not נְתָנָ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> and suffered לָק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> them not to rise אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> against Saul וְשָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> But Saul קָ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> rose up מֵהַמְּעָרָ֖ה <S%H4631><s%> out of the cave וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> on [his] way ס

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> also arose דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> David אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> after כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> afterward and went out [מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at המערה כ] (מֵֽהַמְּעָרָ֔ה <S%H4631><s%> cave ק) וַיִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> and cried אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> behind שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> My lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיַּבֵּ֤ט <S%H5027><s%> looked שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And when Saul אַֽחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> behind וַיִּקֹּ֨ד <S%H6915><s%> stooped דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> him David אַפַּ֛יִם <S%H639><s%> with his face אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the earth וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David לְשָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> to Saul לָ֧מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִשְׁמַ֛ע <S%H8085><s%> Wherefore hearest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> words אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> thou men's לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> Behold David מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> seeketh רָעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7451><s%> adversity

הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> Behold הַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Behold this day הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> this רָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> have seen עֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after נְתָנְךָ֩ <S%H5414><s%> had delivered יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> how that the LORD הַיּ֤וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> thee to day בְּיָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> into mine hand בַּמְּעָרָ֔ה <S%H4631><s%> in the cave וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> and [some] bade לַהֲרָגֲךָ֖ <S%H2026><s%> [me] kill וַתָּ֣חָס <S%H2347><s%> thee but [mine eye] spared עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> on וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> thee and I said לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> I will not put forth יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> mine hand בַּֽאדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> against my lord כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מְשִׁ֥יחַ <S%H4899><s%> anointed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for he [is] the LORD'S הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְאָבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> Moreover my father רְאֵ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> see גַּ֗ם <S%H1571><s%> Indeed רְאֵ֛ה <S%H7200><s%> yea see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּנַ֥ף <S%H3671><s%> the skirt מְעִילְךָ֖ <S%H4598><s%> of thy robe בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> in my hand כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for בְּכָרְתִי֩ <S%H3772><s%> for in that I cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּנַ֨ף <S%H3671><s%> the skirt מְעִֽילְךָ֜ <S%H4598><s%> of thy robe וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and did not הֲרַגְתִּ֗יךָ <S%H2026><s%> and killed דַּ֤ע <S%H3045><s%> thee not know וּרְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> thou and see כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> that אֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> there בְּיָדִ֜י <S%H3027><s%> in mine hand רָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> that [there is] neither evil וָפֶ֙שַׁע֙ <S%H6588><s%> nor transgression וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not חָטָ֣אתִי <S%H2398><s%> and I have not sinned לָ֔ךְ וְאַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you צֹדֶ֥ה <S%H6658><s%> against thee yet thou huntest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> my soul לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> to take

יִשְׁפֹּ֤ט <S%H8199><s%> judge יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵינֶ֔ךָ <S%H996><s%> between וּנְקָמַ֥נִי <S%H5358><s%> avenge יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> between me and thee and the LORD מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> but וְיָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> me of thee but mine hand לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become בָּֽךְ׃

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after יֹאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> As saith מְשַׁל֙ <S%H4912><s%> the proverb הַקַּדְמֹנִ֔י <S%H6931><s%> of the ancients מֵרְשָׁעִ֖ים <S%H7561><s%> condemn יֵ֣צֵא <S%H3318><s%> proceedeth רֶ֑שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> Wickedness וְיָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> but mine hand לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become בָּֽךְ׃

אַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> After מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> whom יָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> come out מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> whom is the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> ? after מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Whom אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you רֹדֵ֑ף <S%H7291><s%> whom dost thou pursue אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> ? after כֶּ֣לֶב <S%H3611><s%> dog מֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> a dead אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after פַּרְעֹ֥שׁ <S%H6550><s%> flea אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> a

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְדַיָּ֔ן <S%H1781><s%> therefore be judge וְשָׁפַ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> and judge בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵינֶ֑ךָ <S%H996><s%> between וְיֵ֙רֶא֙ <S%H7200><s%> between me and thee and see וְיָרֵ֣ב <S%H7378><s%> and plead אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִיבִ֔י <S%H7379><s%> my cause וְיִשְׁפְּטֵ֖נִי <S%H8199><s%> and deliver מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> me out of thine hand פ

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּכַלּ֣וֹת <S%H3615><s%> had made an end דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And it came to pass when David לְדַבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> of speaking אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֤ים <S%H1697><s%> these words הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto Saul וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> that Saul הֲקֹלְךָ֥ <S%H6963><s%> [Is] this thy voice זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> is this בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> my son דָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> lifted up שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> to Saul קֹל֖וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice וַיֵּֽבְךְּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> and wept
